verbs.description: By Jamie Tarabay , CNN SINGAPORE - [ARG0: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: met] [ARG1: with Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] , [ARGM-TMP: hours after arriving in Singapore and ahead of an historic summit with US President Donald Trump] . Lee will have a separate meeting with Trump on Monday .

By Jamie Tarabay , CNN SINGAPORE - [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] met with Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on Sunday , hours after [V: arriving] [ARG4: in Singapore] and ahead of an historic summit with US President Donald Trump . Lee will have a separate meeting with Trump on Monday .
